data.message: what the hell ? does Kent ans Sussex not exist this year ? oh well.

replies.message: Hi Lindsey, each year, we try to cover as much of the country as we can but unfortunately, we can't visit every single town and city. To ensure that as many people as possible get the opportunity to experience the tour we update the route every year to add new locations.
Not very good that nowhere in Kent or Sussex is covered? Yet you’ve got locations that are near each other? Figure that one out? Let’s cover new places yet go to London 5 times 😂
I get not visiting every town, but every region should have had one event at her very least.  But hey ho wont spoil my xmas .
Connor Fletcher well I’m buying no Coca Cola anymore let’s start a Pepsi truck going
